name: Mew
author: Mitsuhiro Arita
flavor_text: Its DNA is said to contain the genetic codes of all Pokémon, so it can use all kinds of techniques.

abilities.name: Memories of Dawn
abilities.effect: This Pokémon can use the attacks of any of your Basic Pokémon in play. (You still need the necessary Energy to use each attack.)

attacks.name: Encounter
attacks.effect: Search your deck for a Pokémon, reveal it, and put it into your hand. Shuffle your deck afterward.
